name: Raid!
description:
Raid! Lore:

Your tasked with reclaiming your 'Dynasties' former glory by returning to your lost lands. You are able to build a variety of towers and build trade routes between designated trade centers to further your influence. However, as you get closer to your kingdoms homeland you begin to remember what pushed your elders out...

Some features // What to expect:


~Naming your own dynasty
~Build towers
~Connect paths to trade routes on the level
~Capture castles and upgrade them independently of your own
~Upgrade towers and kingdoms to make them more powerful
~Defend against enemy waves and finale waves

Expect a round to consist of building paths to other trade routes and castles to earn coin. Building towers is a core part of our game and your experience they are used for defense against the attackers. You must capture all of the castles on the map in order to start the final round. If your main kingdom stands after the final you win.
